headline: Can Devon Build a Resilient Portfolio Through Targeted Acquisitions?
summary: DVN builds scale and resilience through high-return acquisitions in different basins across the United States.

headline: Energy Stocks: Winners And Losers At The Beginning Of H2 2025

headline: 3 Passive Income Powerhouses Down Between 9% and 39% to Buy in July
summary: Oil prices remain at a level that ensures a handsome cash flow and dividend for Devon Energy.  APA is an exploration and production company that offers a generous high-yield dividend.  McDonald’s is known around the globe and has an exceptional business model that is built to last.
